feed.title: RecipeSage Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v2.15.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: update assistant to gpt4o, improve PDF scanning/import, compact view for my recipes by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1407
  • feat: assistant updates & minor styling updates by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1409
  • various tests create/delete/get labels by @UlianaPurtova in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1374
  • Meal Plan tests by @UlianaPurtova in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1378
  • feat: rename shopping lists and meal plans by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1411
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1410
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1412
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1413
  • feat: enable pt-pt and nl languages in frontend by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1414
  • fix: handle various sharing possiblities in recipe details popover by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1415
  • fix: save button text expanding outside of button by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1416

Full Changelog: https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/compare/v2.14.9...v2.15.0

entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v2.15.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1422
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1423
  • Fix(rtl): better rtl support (#1236) by @levyitay in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1381
  • Add queso fresco to the dairy category by @Felttrip in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1424
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1425
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1430

New Contributors

Full Changelog: https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/compare/v2.15.2...v2.15.3
